<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H2636|חַסְפַּס]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חֲסַף‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==clay, potsherd== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***clay vessel***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> plural ***potsherds*** [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>68</sup>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***potsherd***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חצְבָא‎</span>, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָצָב‎</span> ***clay vessel***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—aƒbu***</u></abbr>, ***id.***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***jar*** ([[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>1238</sup>), whence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pottery*** [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>169</sup>, but Sabean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חסף‎</span> ***jar***, acc to [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>ZMG</sup> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>xivi (1892), 532</sup>; compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***jar*** (transposed; [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>1265</sup>); see Biblical Hebrew [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חַסְפַּם‎</span>]); — <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ח‎</span> absolute [[Dan.2.41|Dan 2:41]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יְ פֶּחָר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ח‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חֲסַ֑ף‎</span> v[[Dan.2.33|Dan 2:33]]. v[[Dan.2.42|Dan 2:42]] construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎טִינָא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ח‎</span> v[[Dan.2.41|Dan 2:41]]. v[[Dan.2.43|Dan 2:43]] emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חַסְפָּא‎</span> v[[Dan.2.34|Dan 2:34]]. v[[Dan.2.35|Dan 2:35]]. v[[Dan.2.43|Dan 2:43]].v: 45.
